oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge of Eliott H. Boyd, Co, G, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eliott H. Boyd was from Jasper, Tenn. and moved to Rhea County after the Civil War. He worked as a Church of Christ circuit riding preacher and served Rhea and Bledsoe Counties. His discharge was at one time attached to his pension application form as it has a claim number and a date of 1902 on the upper left corner.
